sense.gloss: to seize, to catch, to grasp, to grip, to grab, to clutch, to hold, to catch hold of, to lay one's hands on
to obtain, to acquire, to get, to win, to capture
to understand, to grasp, to comprehend

sdata.j: ↑雲↑↓くも↓を|↑掴↑↓つか↓む|ような↑話↑↓はなし↓だな。
sdata.e: What you are saying doesn't make sense.

sdata.j: ↑溺↑↓おぼ↓れる↑者↑↓もの↓は↑藁↑↓わら↓をも|↑掴↑↓つか↓む|。

sdata.e: A drowning man will catch at a straw.
